headline: Coinbase-backed exchange users report sudden withdrawal problems

headline: Coinbase price target lowered to $290 from $400 at Needham
summary: Needham analyst John Todaro lowered the firm’s price target on Coinbase (COIN) to $290 from $400 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm lowered its estimates and price targets across the cryptoasset sector as it sees continued weakness in crypto volumes for the next couple quarters. headline: Klarna Group (KLAR) Collaborates With Coinbase for Stablecoin Funding
summary: Klarna Group plc (NYSE:KLAR) is among the 7 Best Digital Payments Stocks to Invest In Now.
